custom_nodes.author: loz2754
custom_nodes.title: AUN ComfyUI Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A collection of workflow helper nodes focused on organization + control (bypass/mute/collapse/group control), prompt/text utilities, file/path helpers, and image/video save helpers (optional VHS integration).

custom_nodes.author: capitan01R
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-CapitanZiT-Scheduler
custom_nodes.description: A lightweight ComfyUI custom scheduler & sigma generator for Z-Image-Turbo. Delivers a stable linear sigma schedule (1.0 → 0.0) for rectified-flow/flow-matching, boosting few-step generation (8-9 steps) with superior consistency, reduced noise, and full compatibility with the model's distilled pipeline.

custom_nodes.title: comfyui-deterministic-nodes

custom_nodes.author: vantagewithai
custom_nodes.title: Vantage-Nodes
custom_nodes.description: This release introduces Vantage Nodes, a powerful utility and infrastructure node pack for ComfyUI, designed for advanced workflows, batch processing, and experimental pipelines.

custom_nodes.author: vantagewithai
custom_nodes.title: Vantage-Step-Audio-EditX
custom_nodes.description: This project is a custom node implementation built on top of Step-Audio-EditX. It adapts and extends EditX capabilities to support multi‑speaker, long‑format, voice cloning, and emotion/style/speed editing, enabling you to feed in a script with multiple speakers, inline pauses, paralinguistic cues, and get a concatenated audio output in one pass.

custom_nodes.author: zengxianyu
custom_nodes.title: Phase-Preserving Noise
custom_nodes.description: Generate phase-preserving structured noise for the input image.

custom_nodes.author: 3R3BOS
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-3R3BOS-Pack
custom_nodes.description: Control and visualization toolkit (Gatekeeper, Slider) and more in the future.

custom_nodes.author: JasonHoku
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Ultimate Auto Sampler Config Grid Testing Suite
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI Sampler testing & benchmarking tool for testing Stable Diffusion samplers, schedulers, CFG scales, prompts, img2img denoise values, and LoRA combinations. Features infinite-canvas dashboard image grids with virtual scrolling that can handle thousands of images, multi-model comparison, automatic resume on interrupt, and real-time visualization. Test entire checkpoint folders, stack multiple LoRAs, generate random seed variations, and export optimized configs. Includes fullscreen mode, keyboard navigation, smart filtering by parameters, and one-click regeneration workflow. Perfect for sampler output optimization and hyperparameter tuning.

custom_nodes.author: jchiotaka
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-tile-calculator
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom node for calculating tile dimensions in upscaling workflows

custom_nodes.author: danielvw
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-WanMove-Adapter
custom_nodes.description: This custom node allows you to convert trajectories from JSON files directly into WanMove TRACKS.

custom_nodes.description: Simple node to patch ComfyUI generation with the SDXL Flux2VAE arch support.
